name: Unearth Your Gays
description:
A story about (un)dead boyfriends.

Max (name changeable) finds himself in need of accommodation when he goes to university, and ends up sharing a house with four men who seem to be hiding something...

Content Warning: Contains references to an abusive relationship.

Note: The game contains over 20,000 words and was created for YaoiJam 2020. This game is mostly complete, but there is no music, and the sprites are still unfinished.
